description: Energy depleted, spark dimmed. Let's reignite your fire.

art.title: Inner Fire Rekindling
art.instruction: Draw a dimmed flame, then show it growing brighter with each breath of inspiration.
art.affirmation: My inner fire burns bright with renewed motivation and purpose

art.title: Dream Vision Board
art.instruction: Create visual representation of what excites you and gives you energy.
art.affirmation: I reconnect with dreams that ignite my motivation

art.title: Energy Flow Art
art.instruction: Draw energy as flowing river - show where it's blocked and where it flows freely.
art.affirmation: I identify and clear blocks to let my natural energy flow freely

breathwork.title: Energizing Breath
breathwork.instruction: Quick, energizing breaths - breathe fire belly breaths to reignite inner energy.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe energy and vitality into my body and spirit

breathwork.title: Motivation Visualization Breath
breathwork.instruction: Breathe while visualizing goals that truly excite you. Let breath carry motivation.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe life into my dreams and feel motivation returning

somatic.title: Energy Activation Movement
somatic.instruction: Move body in ways that feel energizing - stretching, dancing, jumping in place.
somatic.affirmation: I activate my body's natural energy through joyful movement

somatic.title: Motivation Gesture Practice
somatic.instruction: Create victory gestures and power poses to reignite motivational energy.
somatic.affirmation: I embody motivation through powerful, energized gestures

cbt.title: Motivation Block Analysis
cbt.instruction: Examine what's blocking motivation. Fear? Perfectionism? Overwhelm? Address root causes.
cbt.affirmation: I understand and address what blocks my natural motivation

rebt.title: Perfect Motivation Demand
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'I should always feel motivated.' Motivation naturally ebbs and flows.
rebt.affirmation: I accept motivation's natural rhythms and work with my energy cycles

neural.title: Motivated Self Installation
neural.instruction: Visualize yourself as naturally motivated person. Install this energized identity.
neural.affirmation: I am naturally motivated and energized by life's possibilities

journaling.title: What Lights You Up Journal
journaling.instruction: Write about what genuinely excites and energizes you. Reconnect with your spark.
journaling.affirmation: I reconnect with what lights up my soul and reignites my passion

eft.title: Motivation Restoration Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I lack motivation, I choose to reconnect with my natural energy and enthusiasm.'
eft.affirmation: I restore my natural motivation and enthusiasm for life

emdr.title: Motivated Memory Installation
emdr.instruction: Install memories of feeling highly motivated through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I carry the energy of my most motivated moments within me

yoga.title: Energizing Sun Salutations
yoga.instruction: Practice sun salutations to build heat and energy in your body.
yoga.affirmation: I generate energy and motivation through mindful movement
